visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts Sankey chart with the following specifications: Chart type: Sankey, Chart title: 'Node Distance Demo', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark background with white text for titles and labels, Data series: Include data series with nodes A, B, C, and D and their respective weights, Custom colors: Use a specific color palette for nodes and links, Additional configurations: Set chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration object is designed to render a Sankey chart with a dark background and white text for titles and labels. The chart is titled 'Node Distance Demo' and includes a subtitle explaining the node distance setting. The data series includes nodes A, B, C, and D with specified weights, and the nodes and links are colored using a custom palette. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins, background color, and enabling the legend with white text. This setup ensures a visually appealing and informative Sankey chart.
